title.oldValue: Microsoft Viva: Share Viva Goals OKRs directly to teams chats/channels
title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Get link preview and interact with goals directly within Microsoft Teams chat

description.oldValue: Users can now copy and paste links to OKRs in Teams chats and channels, and the links will automatically be replaced to display a card with OKR details.
description.newValue: This feature gives users the ability to share links to goals as rich adaptive cards, including progress and status. Users get the context they need around goals they're working towards and can also update them in Microsoft Teams without losing focus or clicking away from the conversation.
